heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Preservation and Protection and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Preservation and Protection and 
other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of 
Sections 7 and 8 of Part 2) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (preservation protection emergency measure public interest) act 2020 (continuation section 7 8 part 2) order 2020

title: subsection (4) of section 2 of that Act, continue in operation until the 9th day of
heading: 2. The amendments effected by sections 7 and 8 of Part 2 of the Health
text_raw:
2. The amendments effected by sections 7 and 8 of Part 2 of the Health 
(Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020) shall continue in operation for the period 
beginning on the 18th day of September 2020 and ending on the 31st day of 
December 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [350]

title: subsection (4) of section 2 of that Act, continue in operation until the 9th day of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Part 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No.155 of 2020) 
extended the operation of the amendments effected by Part 2 of the Health 
(Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) 
Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020) from their original expiry date of 9 May 2020 until 19 
June 2020. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Part 2) (No. 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 207 
of 2020) extended the operation of the amendments effected by Part 2 of the Health 
(Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) 
Act 2020 until 10 August 2020. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Part 2) (No. 3) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 285 
of 2020) further extended the operation of the amendments effected by Part 2 of the 
Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest) Act 2020, to 31 March 2021 as respects sections 4, 5 and 6, and to 17 
September 2020 as respects sections 7 and 8. 

This Order extends the amendments effected by Part 2 of the Health (Preservation 
and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020, to 
31 December 2020 as respects sections 7 and 8.
